org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class Clients

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.Clients

public class Clients
extends java.lang.Object

Clients manages the inforamtion about registered clients. Each client becomes a Connection, OutgoingMessageBuffer and OutgoingMessageClient. Clients stores this information in three maps.

Author:
Dijana Micijevic, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2003/04, Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06

Method Detail

getInstance

public static Clients getInstance()
Gets the instance of this class.

Returns:
instance of Clients

addClient

public void addClient(java.lang.String clientID,
                      Connection connection)
Adds a new client with a given connection. An OutgoingMessageBuffer and an OutgoingMessageClient are created and added into the corresponding maps. The OutgoingMessageClient thread is started here.

Parameters:
clientID - id of the client
connection - connection assigned to the client

addNotificationClient

public void addNotificationClient(java.lang.String clientID,
                                  java.lang.String channelName,
                                  Connection connection)
Adds a new notification channel client with a given connection. An OutgoingMessageBuffer and an OutgoingMessageClient are created and added into the corresponding maps. The OutgoingMessageClient thread is started.

Parameters:
clientID - id of the client
channelName - The name of the notification channel.
connection - connection assigned to the client

getNotificationChannelClientID

public java.lang.String getNotificationChannelClientID(java.lang.String channelName)
Gets the client id of the notification channel associated with a channel name.

Parameters:
channelName - The channel name of the notification channel.
Returns:
The client id of the associated host.

protected boolean isRegistered(java.lang.String clientID)
Checks if client with given clientID is registered.

Parameters:
clientID - id of client
Returns:
true if the client is registered

isRegistered

protected boolean isRegistered(Connection connection)
Checks if there is a client registered with this connection.

Parameters:
connection - for which we search for a client
Returns:
true if the client is registered with this connection
